title: Refractories from earth and sea
brief_description: Tells the story of an industrial enterprise engaged in the production of refractories - the heat resistant materials used in the construction of equipment required to contain fire and heat, and the many uses of refractories, in lining furnaces, firegrates and atomic power-plants
